title: Cycling’s greatest victory salutes: ‘In the end, you’re the winner — you’re allowed to do whatever you want’
content:
Throw your hands in the air like you just don’t care: Sagan, Ciccone, and Flecha on putting on a show with charismatic salutes.

Read the full article at Cycling’s greatest victory salutes: ‘In the end, you’re the winner — you’re allowed to do whatever you want’ on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
